content:
Company Policy Document - 2025
Last Updated: January 15, 2025

MEMORYGATE CORPORATION
Employee Handbook and Company Policies

SECTION 1: WORK SCHEDULE
- Standard work hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday
- Office location: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105
- Remote work policy: Employees may work from home 2 days per week
- Vacation days: 15 days per year for all employees

SECTION 2: BENEFITS
- Health insurance: Company covers 80% of premium costs
- Dental insurance: Company covers 70% of premium costs
- 401(k) matching: Company matches up to 5% of employee contributions
- Stock options: Available after 1 year of employment

SECTION 3: SALARY STRUCTURE
- Entry-level positions: $60,000 - $75,000 annually
- Mid-level positions: $80,000 - $120,000 annually
- Senior positions: $130,000 - $180,000 annually
- Annual salary review: Conducted every January

SECTION 4: PROJECT DEADLINES
- Q1 2025 projects: Due March 31, 2025
- Q2 2025 projects: Due June 30, 2025
- Q3 2025 projects: Due September 30, 2025
- Q4 2025 projects: Due December 31, 2025

SECTION 5: CONTACT INFORMATION
- HR Department: hr@memorygate.io
- IT Support: it@memorygate.io
- Main phone: (415) 555-0100
- Emergency contact: (415) 555-0199

This document is effective as of January 15, 2025 and supersedes all previous policy documents.

Company Policy Document - 2026 UPDATED
Last Updated: January 8, 2026

MEMORYGATE CORPORATION
Employee Handbook and Company Policies - REVISED

IMPORTANT: This document updates and replaces the 2025 policy document. All previous policies are superseded.

SECTION 1: WORK SCHEDULE
- Standard work hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday
- Office location: 456 Innovation Drive, San Francisco, CA 94107 (NEW LOCATION - moved in December 2025)
- Remote work policy: Employees may work from home 3 days per week (UPDATED from 2 days)
- Vacation days: 20 days per year for all employees (INCREASED from 15 days)

SECTION 2: BENEFITS
- Health insurance: Company covers 85% of premium costs (INCREASED from 80%)
- Dental insurance: Company covers 75% of premium costs (INCREASED from 70%)
- 401(k) matching: Company matches up to 6% of employee contributions (INCREASED from 5%)
- Stock options: Available after 6 months of employment (REDUCED from 1 year)

SECTION 3: SALARY STRUCTURE
- Entry-level positions: $65,000 - $80,000 annually (INCREASED from $60k-$75k)
- Mid-level positions: $85,000 - $130,000 annually (INCREASED from $80k-$120k)
- Senior positions: $140,000 - $200,000 annually (INCREASED from $130k-$180k)
- Annual salary review: Conducted every January (unchanged)

SECTION 4: PROJECT DEADLINES
- Q1 2026 projects: Due March 31, 2026
- Q2 2026 projects: Due June 30, 2026
- Q3 2026 projects: Due September 30, 2026
- Q4 2026 projects: Due December 31, 2026

SECTION 5: CONTACT INFORMATION
- HR Department: hr@memorygate.io (unchanged)
- IT Support: support@memorygate.io (UPDATED from it@memorygate.io)
- Main phone: (415) 555-0200 (UPDATED from 555-0100)
- Emergency contact: (415) 555-0299 (UPDATED from 555-0199)

This document is effective as of January 8, 2026 and supersedes the January 15, 2025 policy document.
